comment.text: Essential for the utilization of choline as a precursor.
An alcohol + NAD(+) = an aldehyde or ketone + NADH.
Amine and polyamine biosynthesis; betaine biosynthesis via choline pathway; betaine aldehyde from choline (dehydrogenase route): step 1/1.
By choline and by high osmolarity in the presence of choline.
Belongs to the iron-containing alcohol dehydrogenase family.
